name: Sorcerer's mid-month exam
description:
This is a vr-only game.

Gameplay.

In game, you will act as a young sorcerer, finish your mid-month exam.

The examination venue is a medium-sized area. You can explore freely inside. And the topic of this exam is fight.
There will be a small-sized mermaid go with you.Her health is better than you,but she does not have attack ability, you need protect her.

You can draw a pattern by right-hand, the specific pattern can cast a spell.
You have follow spells.
- summon a dagger
- summon a fireball Shooter
- throw lightnings

All melee attack can counterattack, after success X times, then you can smash the enemy.
But spells attack isn't,after success of spell counterattack, a quick spell available in left hand.

You will meet a werewolf, a arachnid, a dragon and several other monsters.

Besides fighting, there is a few rune-stone puzzle, and a few fine view.


Others part.

The enemy have a high damage, be careful with their attack.Of course, smash-the-enemy also has a high damage.

The difficulty of this game is not particularly high, but be careful not to hit your own monitor.

Narrow playing place may affect the gaming experience.
